featured.text: He then _____ himself as a security guard and walked out the front gate.
The headgear was later made mandatory at construction sites in major construction projects, such as the Hoover Dam in 1931 and the Golden Gate Bridge in 1933.

definition.zh_def: 門，通常指進出某個地方的可移動障礙物。
definition.en_def: A movable barrier that allows or prevents access to an area.
definition.example: She opened the gate to let the dog out into the yard.
